price: ទ្រង់បានមានបន្ទូលថាៈ ឱអ៊ីព្លីស. ហេតុអ្វីបានជាឯងមិន ព្រមចូលរួមជាមួយបណ្ដាអ្នកដែលស៊ូជូត?
arabic: قَالَ يَٰٓإِبۡلِيسُ مَا لَكَ أَلَّا تَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāib'līsu mā laka allā takūna maʿa al-sājidīna
